Compute the Euclidean distance between cases and/or pumps.

Source: R/euclideanDistance.R
euclideanDistance.Rd

Compute the Euclidean distance between cases and/or pumps.

euclideanDistance(origin = 1, destination = NULL, type = "case-pump",
  observed = TRUE, case.location = "address", vestry = FALSE,
  unit = "meter", time.unit = "second", walking.speed = 5)

Arguments

origin

Numeric or Character. Numeric ID of case or pump. Character landmark name.
destination

Numeric or Character. Numeric ID(s) of case(s) or pump(s). Exclusion is possible via negative selection (e.g., -7). Default is NULL, which returns closest pump or "anchor" case. Character landmark name.
type

Character "case-pump", "cases" or "pumps".
observed

Logical. Use observed or "simulated" expected data.
case.location

Character. For observed = FALSE: "address" or "nominal". "nominal" is the x-y coordinate of regular.cases.
vestry

Logical. TRUE uses the 14 pumps from the Vestry Report. FALSE uses the 13 pumps from the original map.
unit

Character. Unit of distance: "meter", "yard" or "native". "native" returns the map's native scale. See vignette("roads") for information on unit distances.
time.unit

Character. "hour", "minute", or "second".
walking.speed

Numeric. Walking speed in km/hr.

Value

An R data frame.

Note

The function uses a case's "address" (i.e., "anchor" case of a stack) to compute distance. Time is computed using distanceTime().

Examples

# path from case 1 to nearest pump.
euclideanDistance(1)
#>   case anchor pump    pump.name distance     time
#> 1    1      1    7 Broad Street 66.39039 47.80108

# path from case 1 to pump 6.
euclideanDistance(1, 6)
#>   case anchor pump                 pump.name distance     time
#> 1    1      1    6 Little Marlborough Street 270.3884 194.6797

# exclude pump 7 from consideration.
euclideanDistance(1, -7)
#>   case anchor pump     pump.name distance     time
#> 1    1      1    9 Bridle Street 170.5289 122.7808

# path from case 1 to case 6.
euclideanDistance(1, 6, type = "cases")
#>   caseA caseB anchorA anchorB distance     time
#> 1     1     6       1       6  125.428 90.30819

# path from pump 1 to pump 6.
euclideanDistance(1, 6, type = "pumps")
#>   pumpA pumpB   pump.nameA                pump.nameB distance     time
#> 1     1     6 Market Place Little Marlborough Street 279.7798 201.4415
